trans-unit.source: Specifies the set of execution contexts in which a class object will be made available for requests to construct instances.
trans-unit.target: 指定一組執行內容，其中類別物件將可讓建構執行個體的要求使用。

trans-unit.source: The values in the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext> enumeration are used in the `classContext` parameter of the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationServices.RegisterTypeForComClients%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 中的值<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext>列舉型別用於`classContext`參數<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationServices.RegisterTypeForComClients%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: These values are the same as those defined in the COM **CLSCTX** enumeration, which is used as the `dwClsContext` parameter in calls to the COM API `CoRegisterClassObject`.
trans-unit.target: 這些值是定義在 COM 中的相同**CLSCTX**列舉型別，可做為`dwClsContext`參數對 COM API 的呼叫`CoRegisterClassObject`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `CoRegisterClassObject` and the **CLSCTX** enumeration, see the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`CoRegisterClassObject`和**CLSCTX**列舉型別，請參閱 MSDN library。

trans-unit.source: Disables activate-as-activator (AAA) activations for this activation only.
trans-unit.target: 僅針對此啟動過程 (Activation) 停用 Activate-As-Activator (AAA) 啟動過程。

trans-unit.source: Enables activate-as-activator (AAA) activations for this activation only.
trans-unit.target: 僅針對此啟動過程啟用 activate-as-activator (AAA) 啟動過程。

trans-unit.source: Allows the downloading of code from the Directory Service or the Internet.
trans-unit.target: 允許從目錄服務或網際網路下載程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Begin this activation from the default context of the current apartment.
trans-unit.target: 從目前 Apartment 的預設內容開始這個啟動過程。

trans-unit.source: The code that manages objects of this class is an in-process handler.
trans-unit.target: 管理這個類別之物件的程式碼是同處理序 (In-Process) 處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用。

trans-unit.source: The code that creates and manages objects of this class is a DLL that runs in the same process as the caller of the function specifying the class context.
trans-unit.target: 建立並管理這個類別之物件的程式碼是 DLL，而且它與指定類別內容之函式的呼叫端在相同的處理序中執行。

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用。

trans-unit.source: The EXE code that creates and manages objects of this class runs on same machine but is loaded in a separate process space.
trans-unit.target: 建立並管理這個類別之物件的 EXE 程式碼在相同的電腦上執行，但載入不同的處理序空間中。

trans-unit.source: Disallows the downloading of code from the Directory Service or the Internet.
trans-unit.target: 不允許從目錄服務或網際網路下載程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether activation fails if it uses custom marshaling.
trans-unit.target: 指定如果啟動過程使用自訂封送處理 (Marshaling) 時，是否會失敗。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the logging of failures.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫失敗的記錄。

trans-unit.source: A remote machine context.
trans-unit.target: 遠端電腦內容。

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用。

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用。

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用。

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用。

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用。
